EmailTemplate.description: Template to notify stakeholders upon reception of RHC Alert 100% UP on a BSP under RHC exceptional monitoring
EmailTemplate.name: RHC Exceptional Monitoring 100 Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: NonNewGen RHC Monitoring – ##COUNTRY## – ##AGENT_NAME## – ##IATA_CODE##
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ##COUNTRY## ##AGENT_NAME## ##IATA_CODE## all amounts owing are exceeding FS ##RHC_AMOUNT## ##RHC_CURRENCY##.
